actions.recommendation: Mild to moderate sloping high frequency hearing loss seen bilaterally. A full test is recommended to assess if further management is needed.
Urology review recommended for age appropriate screening
Please monitor your BP as it was slightly high. If it remains high then please discuss with your primary doctor as you may need to start medication.

You are overweight and your waist to height ratio is more than 50% increasing your risk of cardiovascular disease. Aim for BMI of 25 and waist to height ratio of <50%. Dietician consultation recommended.
Please consider making a Dermatology appointment based on family history and examination. They will assist in doing mole mapping.
